amendatorysection.catchline: Service letter; failure or refusal to supply; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: If any superintendent, manager or contractor shall fail or refuse to issue such letter to such employee upon request, or willfully fail or negligently refuse to give such letter, or fail to state the facts therein correctly, he shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. II, § 14, p. 549;
